ci_support_linux_64_numpy1.20python3.8._:
boost:
- 1.78.0
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '10'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
fftw:
- '3'
libblas:
- 3.9 *netlib
liblapack:
- 3.9 *netlib
numpy:
- '1.20'
openmpi:
- '4'
pin_run_as_build:
  boost:
    max_pin: x.x.x
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.8.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - numpy

about.description:
ALAMODE is a scientific software designed for analyzing lattice
anharmonicity and lattice thermal conductivity of solids. By
using an external DFT package such as VASP and Quantum ESPRESSO, you
can extract harmonic and anharmonic force constants straightforwardly
with ALAMODE. Using the calculated anharmonic force constants, you can
also estimate lattice thermal conductivity, phonon linewidth, and
other anharmonic phonon properties from first principles.
about.summary: Ab initio simulator for thermal transport and lattice anharmonicity

about.summary: Ab initio simulator for thermal transport and lattice anharmonicity

name: alamode

about.description:
ALAMODE is a scientific software designed for analyzing lattice
anharmonicity and lattice thermal conductivity of solids. By
using an external DFT package such as VASP and Quantum ESPRESSO, you
can extract harmonic and anharmonic force constants straightforwardly
with ALAMODE. Using the calculated anharmonic force constants, you can
also estimate lattice thermal conductivity, phonon linewidth, and
other anharmonic phonon properties from first principles.
about.summary: Ab initio simulator for thermal transport and lattice anharmonicity

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "alamode" %}
{% set version = "1.4.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/ttadano/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v.{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 18fb80a183c2a9b68488aeeccd6efa95e8c21d4cb21b08319a557389d55c067a

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - libgomp  # [linux]
    - llvm-openmp  # [osx]
  host:
    - python
    - libblas
    - liblapack
    - openmpi
    - h5py
    - scipy
    - numpy
    - boost
    - eigen
    - spglib
    - fftw
  run:
    - python

test:
  files:
    - si_alm.in
    - si_phband.in
    - si222.xml
  commands:
    - export OMPI_MCA_plm=isolated
    - export OMPI_MCA_btl_vader_single_copy_mechanism=none
    - export OMPI_MCA_rmaps_base_oversubscribe=yes
    - alm si_alm.in
    - anphon si_phband.in

about:
  home: https://github.com/ttadano/alamode
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Ab initio simulator for thermal transport and lattice anharmonicity
  description: |
    ALAMODE is a scientific software designed for analyzing lattice
    anharmonicity and lattice thermal conductivity of solids. By
    using an external DFT package such as VASP and Quantum ESPRESSO, you 
    can extract harmonic and anharmonic force constants straightforwardly
    with ALAMODE. Using the calculated anharmonic force constants, you can
    also estimate lattice thermal conductivity, phonon linewidth, and 
    other anharmonic phonon properties from first principles.
  doc_url: https://alamode.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/ttadano/alamode

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
